EN copy:
> Spend with your BOC credit cards at ZALORA.COM.HK from 1 March to 30 April 2017 to enjoy:

20% off upon spending HK$300 or above by entering the promotion code 'BOCHK20' when checkout;

22% off upon spending HK$500 or above by entering the promotion code 'BOCHK22' when checkout.
ZH copy:
由2017年3月1日至4月30日，憑中銀信用卡於ZALORA.COM.HK簽賬購物，
滿港幣300元或以上，並於結算時輸入優惠代碼「BOCHK20」可專享8折優惠；
滿港幣500元或以上，並於結算時輸入優惠代碼「BOCHK22」可專享78折優惠。
EN T&Cs:
1.Offer is not applicable to any BOC CUP Dual Currency Credit Card.
2.Offer is applicable on regular priced and sale items at ZALORA.COM.HK.
3.Brand exclusions apply, please refer to http://zlrahk.com/2hnaJp7.
4.Offer cannot be used in conjunction with other offers.
5.BOC Credit Card (International) Limited and ZALORA (Hong Kong) Limited reserve the right to make final decisions in case of dispute.
ZH T&Cs:
1.優惠不適用於任何中銀銀聯雙幣信用卡。
2.優惠適用於ZALORA.COM.HK上之正價及特價貨品。
3.優惠不適用於部份品牌，詳情請參閱http://zlrahk.com/2hnaJp7。
4.優惠不能與其他推廣優惠同時使用 。
5.如有任何爭議，中銀信用卡(國際)有限公司及 ZALORA (Hong Kong) Limited保留最終決定權。

EN copy: Enjoy 2,000 reward-U points upon successful sign up as reward-U member through dedicated link.
ZH copy: 經指定連結成功登記成為reward-U會員，即享2,000 reward-U積分。
EN T&Cs:
1. Offer is valid from March 4 to 25, 2017 (23:59).
2. Customers must register as a reward-U member through https://goo.gl/scJxfj and activate the reward-U account via an activation email.
3. The name used to register the reward-U program must be the same name on his/her HKID or passport.
4. Each email address that you provided at sign up can only be used once only.
5. For enquiries, please contact us at guest.relations@reward-U.com .
6. Terms and conditions for the “reward-U” Programme are applicable. Please refer to www.reward-u.com for details.
7. In case of dispute, the decision of Wellcome and REWARD-U (HK) LIMITED are final and binding.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 推廣日期由2017年3月4日至25日(23:59)止。
2. 必須經https://goo.gl/scJxfj 成功登記成為reward-U會員，並透過系統自動發送的電郵激活reward-U賬戶。
3. 用於登記reward-U獎賞計劃之名字必須與護照上所顯示的名字完全相同。
4. 每個電子郵箱不可重覆登記成為reward-U會員。如有發現，reward-U有權即時取消其會籍資格的權利。
5. 如有任何疑問，請發送電郵至 guest.relations@reward-U.com 查詢。
6. 須受reward-U條款及細則約束，詳情請瀏覽www.reward-u.com。
7. 如有任何爭議，REWARD-U (HK) LIMITED保留最終決定權。
